response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item holds significant value for us, reflecting over $800,000 in investment, innovation, and expertise. Considering its exceptional quality and the dedication that went into its creation, we are offering this extraordinary piece to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. We are confident that you will appreciate its true worth and find immense value in owning it. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this masterpiece with you.", "product_price": 750000}
